text: Atahpara tadera pare sthalabhisikta hayechila eka uttarapurusa yara grantha uttaradhikara karechila, tara amkare dharechila e'i sadharana jibanera tuccha-bastusaba ara balato -- ''amadera to mapha kare deya habe.â€™â€™ Ara yadi tadera kache tara mato bastugulo ase tabe tara ta grahana kare. Tadera kacha theke ki granthera angikara ne'oya haya ni ye tara allah sanbandhe satya chara ara kichu balabe na, ara tara patha'o kareche ya tate rayeche? Ara parakalera basasthana'i sreya tadera jan'ya yara dharmabhiruta abalanbana kare. Tomara ki tabe bujho na
